channel.title: Install redashV8 on centos7
channel.description:
Hi,I install redashV8.0 on centos7.2. when using command bin/run ./manage.py database create_tables，throws error Traceback (most recent call last): File "/opt/redash/redash-8.0.0/manage.py", line 6, in from redash.cli import manager ImportError: No module named redash.cli
can anyone tell me why?

item.title: Install redashV8 on centos7
item.dc:creator: panda403
item.description:
Hi,I install redashV8.0 on centos7.2.
when using command bin/run ./manage.py database create_tables，throws error
Traceback (most recent call last):
File “/opt/redash/redash-8.0.0/manage.py”, line 6, in
from redash.cli import manager
ImportError: No module named redash.cli

can anyone tell me why?

Read full topic
